IN THE TEACHINGS OF MRS. WHITE, CHRIST IS RECOGNIZED AND EXALTED AS THE ONLY SAVIOUR FOR SINNERS. THAN CHRIST "THERE IS NONE OTHER NAME UNDER HEAVEN GIVEN
247
AMONG MEN, WHEREBY WE MUST BE SAVED." ACTS 4:12. IN HER OWN WORK FOR THE MASTER, SHE EXEMPLIFIED THE FOLLOWING INSTRUCTION GIVEN BY HER TO HER BRETHREN IN THE MINISTRY:
